Despite the phenomenally improved forecasts that government research investments have enabled over recent decades, we have failed to forestall catastrophic damages to many of our communities from hurricanes, floods, heatwaves, droughts, and wildfires. - Dr. Ann Bostrom

It is very difficult if not impossible to attribute a specific weather event to the fact that climate is changing, we can state that the statistical properties of the weather system are changing. This fact alone makes the challenge of weather forecasting more difficult.-Dr. Moore
As further warming proceeds, the changes in extreme weather will continue to grow. We cannot wait until all the uncertainties have resolved themselves. - @profadamsobel

While the US is no stranger to extreme events, impacts from recent events have been unprecedented. A deeper integration of science & practice is urgently needed to strengthen protection of lives & property, ensure military readiness, & sustain economic competitiveness. - Dr. Done

Extreme weather events impact people, infrastructure & processes more than ‚Äúaverage‚Äù events. Our agricultural, energy, water, transportation, public health, & national security institutions are at risk, and this ultimately affects American households and beyond. - @DrShepherd2013
